writing.name: CONTINUE
writing.text: Continue

writing.name: 3_class1
writing.text: You are in class, daydreaming of your dog. You were lucky to borrow your dad’s car today since you missed the bus.

writing.name: 3_desk_ash1
writing.text: Ash: Hey! Yesterday was great.

writing.name: 3_desk_ash2
writing.text: You: Yeah! I can’t get that song off my mind!

writing.name: 3_desk_max1
writing.text: Max: Hey! Yesterday was great!

writing.name: 3_desk_max2
writing.text: You: Yeah! I can’t get that song off my mind!

writing.name: 3_desk_teacher1
writing.text: Ash: So what's up with the teacher?

writing.name: 3_desk_teacher2
writing.text: You: What do you mean?

writing.name: 3_desk_teacher3
writing.text: Ash: He's acting strange today. A bit too friendly.

writing.name: 3_desk_teacher4
writing.text: You: Max do you know what happened to the teacher?

writing.name: 3_desk_teacher5
writing.text: Max: I don't know, he’s too happy.

writing.name: 3_desk_teacher6
writing.text: You: Hmmm... I’m scared he’ll do a pop quiz.

writing.name: 3_desk_notes
writing.text: After some classes you receive two notes from Max and Ash asking if you could do an errand with them today and maybe hang out for a while.

writing.name: 3_desk_chooseAsh
writing.text: Hang out with Ash.

writing.name: 3_desk_chooseMax
writing.text: Hang out with Max.

writing.name: 3_popQuiz
writing.text: The day passes quickly after an unfortunate pop quiz. No wonder the teacher had a big smile. You hear the bell ring. The day is finally over!

writing.name: 3_ash_classroom1
writing.text: You: Ready Ash?

writing.name: 3_ash_classroom2
writing.text: Ash: Give me a second to pack my stuff

writing.name: 3_ash_bedroom1
writing.text: You get home after a fun afternoon of hanging out with Ash.

writing.name: 3_ash_bedroom3
writing.text: He seemed even a little evasive...but you're so tired it may be your imagination. You don't want to overreact.

writing.name: 3_ash_phone1
writing.text: Your home phone rings. You pick it up.

writing.name: 3_ash_phone2
writing.text: Max: Hey it’s Max. What are you up to?

writing.name: 3_ash_phone3
writing.text: You: Nothing, just laying in bed. You?

writing.name: 3_ash_phone4
writing.text: Max: Same. My sister is visiting home from college so I guess we'll have a special dinner this weekend.

writing.name: 3_ash_phone5
writing.text: You: Oh, that's cool.

writing.name: 3_ash_phone6
writing.text: Max: What do you think about our new classmates?

writing.name: 3_ash_choice1
writing.text: I think they're cool.

writing.name: 3_ash_choice2
writing.text: I don't know, I don’t really care.

writing.name: 3_ash_response
writing.text: Max: I think they are quite nice. They seem to need a lot of pencils though. And what do you think about Ash?

writing.name: 3_ash_choice3
writing.text: Ash is fine I guess... He's cool.

writing.name: 3_ash_choice4
writing.text: I don’t know.... Ash is unique.

writing.name: 3_ash_3_response
writing.text: Max: Yeah, Ash is cool. I wish I could be like him.

writing.name: 3_ash_4_response
writing.text: Max: Hm.... you're right. He’s unique but cool as well.

writing.name: 3_ash_end1
writing.text: You: Well gotta catch some zzz’s. I'll see you tomorrow.

writing.name: 3_ash_end2
writing.text: Max: Bye!

writing.name: 3_max_classroom1
writing.text: You: Ready Max?

writing.name: 3_max_classroom2
writing.text: Max: Give me a second to pack my stuff

writing.name: 3_max_bedroom1
writing.text: You get home after a fun afternoon of hanging out with Max.

writing.name: 3_max_bedroom3
writing.text: Max's big sister was there for her vacation and Max was super excited. You're quite happy and hope they enjoy their get-together.

writing.name: 3_max_phone1
writing.text: Your home phone rings. You pick it up.

writing.name: 3_max_phone2
writing.text: Ash: Hey it’s Ash. What are you up to?

writing.name: 3_max_phone3
writing.text: You: Nothing, just laying in bed. You?

writing.name: 3_max_phone4
writing.text: Ash: Same. Just bored. What do you think about our new classmates?

writing.name: 3_max_decision1
writing.text: I think they're cool.

writing.name: 3_max_decision2
writing.text: I don't know, I don’t really care.

writing.name: 3_max_response1
writing.text: Ash: I think they are ok. And what do you think about Max?

writing.name: 3_max_decision3
writing.text: Max is fine I guess.

writing.name: 3_max_decision4
writing.text: I don’t know.... Max is unique.

writing.name: 3_max_response2
writing.text: Ash: ...Max is nice. Always being there...

writing.name: 3_max_response3
writing.text: You: Guess so. Well I gotta catch some zzz’s. I'll see you tomorrow.

writing.name: 3_max_response4
writing.text: Ash: Bye.
